name: The Make Believe Hero: Rogue 32/Purple Dragon Knight 5/Bard 3
author: WhiZard

posts.author: WhiZard
posts.content:
The Make Believe Hero: Rogue(32), Purple Dragon Knight (5), Bard (3)

Finally, there is a use for the purple class. This build can unleash a 127DC fear spell as early as character level 9. Being of the good alignment and casting protection from good will allow you to cast the PDK fear spell right next to you without becoming afraid. This character is a moderately balanced rogue (versatile with two weapons, weapon and shield, and sling and shield plus proficiency in the common rogue skills) with defensive capabilities and the damage necessary to put a quick end to scared foes. Not too great against the sneak and fear immune, though epic traps can be quite handy to use.

Halfling, Neutral Good
PvM/PvP 1-40 (Preferably lower magic, the leveling and skill distribution assume no magic)
